text: Astyris rosacea, common name the rosy northern dovesnail, is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Columbellidae, the dove snails. ==Description== ==Distribution== This marine species occurs in the North Atlantic Ocean from Greenland to New Jersey, in European waters and in the Beaufort Sea off Alaska. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Columbellidae Category:Gastropods described in 1840
title: Astyris rosacea
